name: Carrington Event
description: Strongest recorded geomagnetic storm. Telegraph systems failed worldwide. Auroras visible at equator.

name: Quebec Blackout
description: Caused complete collapse of Quebec power grid. 6 million without power for 9 hours.

name: Bastille Day Event
description: Solar flare on Bastille Day. Major geomagnetic storm. Satellite disruptions.

name: April 2001 Storm
description: One of largest flares of solar cycle 23. X20 class flare.

name: Halloween Storm
description: Part of Halloween storm sequence. Major satellite and power grid impacts.

name: Halloween Storm 2
description: Largest X-ray flare ever recorded (X28). Saturated sensors.

name: January 2005 Storm
description: Strong solar storm. Proton event affected satellites and airlines.

name: December 2006 Event
description: X-class flare with CME. GPS disruptions reported.

name: August 2011 Storm
description: X6.9 flare. Radiation storm caused airline route diversions.

name: March 2012 Event
description: X5.4 flare with Earth-directed CME. Radio blackouts.

name: July 2012 Storm
description: Fast CME. Would have caused major damage if Earth-directed.

name: St Patrick's Day Storm
description: Strong geomagnetic storm on St. Patrick's Day.

name: September 2017 Storm
description: Largest flare of solar cycle 24. X9.3 from AR 2673.

name: May 2024 Storm
description: Historic G5 geomagnetic storm. Auroras visible at low latitudes globally.
